title: Tokyo Tech Student Exchange Program， Application Due ：the End of February 2008 (reminder)
content:
Dear the Deans of the AOTULE Member Universities


         My name is Shinji ANDO, a secretariat member of AOTULE at Tokyo Tech.

         Please let me remind you again about "the Tokyo Tech student exchange
         program for the AOTULE member universities".

         Tokyo Tech will provide students from AOTULE member universities
         with the opportunities for study at Tokyo Tech for utmost 3 months.
         The exchange students will study under host researchers in Tokyo Tech
         and participate in academic activities for three months.

         Please see the details in the following page, and please recommend
         one or two students until the end of February 2008.
         ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
         http://www.aotule.eng.titech.ac.jp/TokyoTech_Exchange.htm

         (Please let the candidate students to make contact with expected host
         researchers in Tokyo Tech prior to the recommendation.)

         Thank you very much for your cooperation, in advance.

         with very best wishes,

         Shinji ANDO
